description: HE0 files are archives used by adventure games, such as Putt-Putt, Fatty Bear, Pajama Sam, and Freddi Fish, developed by Humongous Entertainment to store game data. The HE0 file is also used by ScummVM, a reiteration of the SCUMM game engine that lets you play classic games on your current machine.
NOTE: The HE0 resource file is located in the game directory.
